narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: New Horizon Home Health LLC is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Davie, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $6.6M in Medicaid payments across 81K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $6.6M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
